MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G66 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Parkburn avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs to a damaged underground cable caused by a 3rd party we had to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:50am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:17pm on Tuesday, 06 April 2021
